About Bloop Museum

Bloop is a retro-tech and gaming museum dedicated to preserving vintage electronics, games, and media formats.

We've been operating for over 17 years, now located in Penn Hills near Monroeville, PA.

Visit, volunteer, or just enjoy the blinking lights and the sweet sound of a floppy drive grinding away.

About Bloop

Bloop isn’t just a museum — it’s a shrine to the glorious past of technology.

We've recovered lost BIOSes, saved innocent floppy disks from extinction, and held over 5,000 tours for curious minds.

If it hums, glows, clicks, or boots from a disk — we probably have it.

What is Bloop?

Bloop is an interactive archive of digital artifacts. From ancient sound cards to forgotten bootleg consoles, we preserve it all.

We also contribute to online databases, host local workshops, and absolutely love when kids gasp at CRTs.
